articles.title: National List of Sarvajana Balaya  revealed
articles.description: The “Sarvajana Balaya” alliance has released its list of candidates nominated to be appointed as national list members of parliament (National List MPs) in the 2024 General Election. MORE..

articles.title: General Election- 690 nominations accepted, 74 rejected
articles.description: The Commissioner General of Elections, Saman Sri Ratnayake, announced that a total of 764 nomination papers were submitted by political parties and independent groups for the 2024 General Election, from the 22 electoral districts across the island. MORE..

articles.title: Japanese atomic bomb survivor group Nihon Hidankyo awarded Nobel Peace Prize
articles.description: Japanese organisation Nihon Hidankyo, a grassroots movement of atomic bomb survivors from Hiroshima and Nagasaki also known as Hibakusha, won the Nobel Peace Prize on Friday. MORE..

articles.title: Crown of Goddess Kali, gifted by PM Modi, stolen from Bangladesh temple
articles.description: A crown of goddess Kali has been stolen from the Jeshoreshwari temple in Satkhira s Shyamnagar. MORE..

articles.title: 18 injured after two buses collide on Colombo-Kandy road
articles.description: Two buses have reportedly collided along the Colombo – Kandy main road this morning (11) resulting in injuries to at least 18 passengers. MORE..

articles.title: Colorado tourist mine accident leaves one person dead; 23 people rescued
articles.description: One person has died and 23 people have been rescued after they were trapped hundreds of feet underground at the Mollie Kathleen Gold Mine, a tourist mine in Cripple Creek, Colorado, officials said Thursday. MORE..
